messages.message: Shared this on call earlier but posting incase it comes up elsewhere. The loading wheel on files that are failing digitization is unclear to the user. Could we add a simple, clear error message that explains what is happening *and what the user can do* so that the user doesnt indefinitely wait and not know where to turn?

Hi @Tom
Are you seeing this with Long tables support enabled? Also how long are the documents here (how many pages)?  UAT is still a constrained env so it can take some time to run through all documents compared to aihub prod which has more resources and dynamic scale up / down.
If the documents stay in this state forever then its something we need to investigate.
We will also definetely look at improving the feedback here while documents are being digitized. @Subash @tj.serkes
